snippet: Jim Calhoun, who had spinal surgery on Monday, returned to the sideline as Connecticut defeated Pittsburgh in its season finale.
abstract: College Basketball Men's East Roundup; Connecticut coach Jim Calhoun, recovering from spinal surgery, returns to the sideline for UConn's 74-65 victory over Pittsburgh; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Jim Calhoun, who had spinal surgery on Monday, returned to the sideline as Connecticut defeated Pittsburgh in its season finale.

headline.seo: Calhoun Returns and Connecticut Defeats Pittsburgh
headline.main: Calhoun’s Fiery Return Gives UConn a Boost Against Pittsburgh
headline.print_headline: Calhoun’s Fiery Return Gives UConn a Boost Against Pittsburgh
